## News

### Upcoming --- SIAM UQ

I am organizing a minisymposium with [Nick Boffi](https://nmboffi.github.io/) titled *Measure flows for Inverse Problems and Machine Learning* ([MS35](https://meetings.siam.org/sess/dsp_programsess.cfm?SESSIONCODE=87134), [MS52](https://meetings.siam.org/sess/dsp_programsess.cfm?SESSIONCODE=87135), and [MS68](https://meetings.siam.org/sess/dsp_programsess.cfm?SESSIONCODE=87136)) at the **SIAM Conference on Uncertainty Quantification** to be held in Minneapolis from March 22--26, 2026.

### December 19, 2025 --- Inverse Days {#dec-19-2025}
I just returned from [*Inverse Days*](https://fips.fi/inverse-days-2025/) in Helsinki, Finland. I also attended last year, and both times it has been the highlight of my year. [Read more](news.html#dec-19-2025)

### December 12, 2025 --- CBMS {#dec-12-2025}
I had the pleasure of attending the [*CBMS Conference on Research at the Interface of Applied Mathematics and Machine Learning (AMML) 2025*](https://www.math.uh.edu/cbms-amml/) at the University of Houston. [Read more](news.html#dec-12-2025)

[More news](news.html)
